description:
Ayanokoji receives a visit from outside the school, and learns more about the conditions of his stay.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitobito wa Tsune ni Sono Hametsu o Negatte Iru. Itsuwari no Zen ni Azamukareru ga Yue ni.
Il popolo molte volte desidera la rovina sua, ingannato da una falsa specie di bene.
People, Often Deceived by an Illusive Good, Desire Their Own Ruin.
Souvent le peuple désire sa ruine, trompé par la fausse apparence.
人々は常にその破滅を願っている. 偽りの善に欺かれるがゆえに.
